channel.title: SNAP on LFortran
channel.description: Recent content in SNAP on LFortran

item.title: LFortran now compiles SNAP
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that LFortran can now successfully compile and run lanl/SNAP, marking a significant milestone in our journey to beta. SNAP is the seventh production-grade, third-party code that LFortran can compile, bringing us closer to our goal of compiling 10 such codesâ€”a critical step toward a beta-quality compiler. About SNAP SNAP (SN Discrete Ordinates Application Proxy) is a proxy application designed to emulate the performance of modern discrete ordinates neutral particle transport codes.
